error.nodeNotFoundMatching: Node not found at path: [{{- path }}, matching [{{- key }} = {{- value }}]
error.nodeNotAMap: Node path: [{{- path }}, matching [{{- key }} = {{- value }}], is not a map
error.propertyNotFound: Node not found at path: [{{- path }}]
error.pathDoesNotExist: Parent node does not exist at: [{{- path }}]
error.seqDoesNotExist: Sequence does not exist at: [{{- path }}]
error.tryingToAppendToNonSequence: Cannot append to non-sequence at: [{{- path }}]
error.startNodeMustBeCollection: Starting node must be an array or an object
error.scalarValuesDoNotHaveProperties: Scalar values do not have properties
